SEARCH
Package com.example.lotterysystemproject.Models

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotterysystemproject.Models.Event
public class Event extends Object
Model class representing an Event for the Entrant's in the system. This class holds all the information related to an event, such as its name, date, location, and participants. It is used to store and retrieve event data from Firestore.
